name: Orb Invasion
description:
Controls:

Cursors - Left and Right

Space - Shoot

Inspired by the 1978 game Space Invaders, this fast playing skill based retro arcade game is easy to play but hard to master.

Welcome to the digital domain once more...

The world is under attack by cyber criminals using the latest information technology to bring entire governments crashing down.

A relentless new version of the virus .. [code named BINARY] .. has taken control of all critical systems and must be stopped!

You are Logic Bot .. a virus detect and destroy program. During a third encounter with the BINARY virus you have been locked into a hostile program. Power up your data packet injection scripts, your only weapon, and blast the encrypted orbs to crack their codes and defeat this invasion, will it ever end?

Good luck Logic Bot ...
